title: Bobby Got His Dog Stroller + Eddie Parent Shamed By Business + Morgan 2 Dating Update
itunes:title: Bobby Got His Dog Stroller + Eddie Parent Shamed By Business + Morgan 2 Dating Update
description:
Bobby finally got his dog stroller, but he wasn’t too happy about it. Eddie tried to buy a tricycle for his son and they only had a pink one available. He was shamed after choosing not to buy it. Who was right? Plus, Morgan 2 updates us on the possibility of going out with a group of four guys that she met from a single profile on a dating app!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
